item.title: Watch live: Fed Chair Powell delivers important policy speech at Jackson Hole
item.description: Markets are looking for Powell to provide strong hints about a September interest rate cut.

item.title: Powell indicates conditions 'may warrant' interest rate cuts as Fed proceeds 'carefully'
item.description: Powell on Friday gave a tepid indication of possible cuts ahead as he noted a high level of uncertainty.

item.title: Wage growth is doing something odd in 2025 â€” the last time it happened was around the Great Recession
item.description: Job "switchers" generally see wages grow at a faster pace than those who stay in their current role. However, that trend has reversed.

item.title: Fed Chair Powell set to deliver big Jackson Hole speech Friday. Here's what Wall Street expects
item.description: Powell is set to deliver what almost certainly will be his last keynote address at the central bank's annual conclave.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves premarket: Nvidia, Intuit, Workday, Ross Stores and more
item.description: These are the stocks posting the largest moves in premarket trading.
